title: Make the nuclear reactor subcritical
description:
OK-650VV The nuclear reactor designed around 1970.
However, they tend to overheat if they are not heated properly.
Regularly (at least once a week) a little boron is injected into the system.
NOTE! This requires a contractor who has a good rubber defect because this is it
all rather wet and hot, and so it is not worse to know
something what you are doing.

title: Hang up the Christmas decorations
description:
As the hotel does not use all 190 may the watts as OK-650VV
can create has been decided. that each year shall be installed
one of the most beautiful Christmas decoration exhibitions that stories go by.
The hanging of the ornament will begin on November 1 every year
and then again to take it down January 10 every year.

title: Cool down snow houses and stop in loopholes
description:
Just during the high summer season, from July 15 to August 25, it needs to be ditched
to the iGloo-ville houses (all). Mainly need to add snow and
make sure there are no holes in the walls, etc.

title: Beat and plow heirlooms of mud houses
description:
During the summer, grass needs to be mowed and the heirlooms of the mud houses need to be plowed at least
once a week. This is valid from May 1 to September 30.

title: Window washing
description:
Once a week, windows on all of the above real estate need to be cleaned.
All houses except the igloo, the submarine and the mud houses, but none of them
has a window.
